On Mon, Jan 19, 2026 at 7:05 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi mitch,  Could you please provide a short test video, or send us a screenshot of the SIMSONN Manager interface?  If the device has entered SIMSONN Flasher mode, please simply release the upgrade button (let it pop back up), then unplug and re-plug the USB cable. It should return to normal working mode.  If it still doesn’t work, please record a complete video (including: USB reconnection, the software screen, and the device status), upload it to Google Drive, and send us the sharing link. Please set the permission to “Anyone with the link can view.”  Also, please let us know which game cannot bind the inputs (e.g., iRacing / ACC / AC / F1 / ETS2, etc.).

After trying solution I could think of and exhausting every forum
suggestion I have come to the conclusion that the control box is faulty.

The Simsonn X Pro Ultra enumerates only as USB Vendor Defined HID and never
appears in joy.cpl. I have tried to flash both the old .SFU and latest
firmware. Device does not show HID joystick usage, and therefore, cannot be
used in game and is useless to me, it is packed up and ready to be returned
to you to start the refund process, please advise if you need anything more
from me to go forward thank you.
